column4: hey if I am using a program in ubuntu (fiesty) and it freezes, what combination of keys (like control-alt-delete) will un-freeze it?
maybe someone has a better solution, but I usually have the gnome-system-manager widget in my gnome bar. it gives you something similar to hitting ctrl alt del
if you pull up a virtual terminal, I recommend you get "htop" an tiny app that shows all running processes and is based on the command line
